cause.description:
Our goal is to raise money for the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. The money raised from this cause will go to benefit the lives of thousands of people.
Every penny earned will go to the following programs: Research for a cure Patient Services Public and Professional Education Advocacy and Community Service
1. Cancer is the leading cause of death in America.
2. Money to research a cure must be raised.
cause.mission: Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma, and improve the quality of life of patients and their families.
cause.name: The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society's Walk of Life
